name: Rotating Escape
description:
MADE FOR KENNY JAM 2021

Exciting escape game in a rotating box

Dodge the flashy walls and collect points

Play with 4 different skills!

Skill 1: Dash. You Dash and become invincible for a little time (Press Space)

Skill 2: Hook. You Hook dont need an explanation (Press Space)

Skill 3: Freeze The Box: The rotation Freeze for a few sec cooldown: 5 sec (Press Space)

Skill 4: Illusion You Dash and leave a mark behind. when you Dash again you TP back to mark (Press Space)

WASD: Move

N: Mute/Unmute sound
